icon.prompt: 1024x1024, ultra-sharp, app icon, no words, no border. A stylized white daisy flower on a soft gradient background of warm coral and calming teal. Minimalist vector style, soft drop shadow, rounded corners implied.
icon.exportNotes: Render as 1024x1024 PNG with transparent background safe zone.

screenshots.headline: Your Care Assistant
screenshots.subline: Always there to help with daily care tasks.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Phone centered, large welcoming chat interface with AI avatar.
screenshots.visualStyle: Clean white interface, soft coral accents, friendly typography.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a chat interface with a friendly AI avatar named Margriet. Message bubbles discussing daily schedule. Soft warm lighting, clean background.

screenshots.headline: Smart Agenda
screenshots.subline: Never miss a medication or appointment.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Calendar view with clear, color-coded events.
screenshots.visualStyle: Organized, legible, high contrast for accessibility.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup displaying a daily timeline view. Cards for 'Medication', 'Lunch', 'Doctor Visit'. Big clear text, checkmarks for completed tasks.

screenshots.headline: Care Community
screenshots.subline: Connect with family and caregivers easily.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Feed view showing updates from family members.
screenshots.visualStyle: Social media vibe but private and secure.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a private social feed. Photos of family, updates on well-being, comments from caregivers. Warm and connected feel.

screenshots.headline: Expert Knowledge
screenshots.subline: Instant answers to your care questions.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Knowledge base search with AI suggestions.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a search screen. 'How to handle sundowning?' typed in. AI providing a summarized, helpful answer with source links.

screenshots.headline: Certified Quality
screenshots.subline: Trusted by professionals and families.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Profile screen showing badges and certifications.
screenshots.visualStyle: Trustworthy, blue and white, official look.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a 'Certificates' screen. Gold badges for 'Dementia Care Certified', 'Privacy First'. Highlighting trust and security.

icon.prompt: 1024x1024, ultra-sharp, app icon, no words, no border. Abstract rising bar chart combined with a lightning bolt, glowing neon blue on a deep midnight blue background. Glassmorphism style, subtle gloss.
icon.exportNotes: Render as 1024x1024 PNG with transparent background safe zone.

screenshots.headline: Real-time Analytics
screenshots.subline: Track your sales as they happen.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Dashboard overview with live ticker and main graph.
screenshots.visualStyle: Dark mode, neon data lines, professional dashboard.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a dark mode dashboard. Large number '$12,450' for daily sales. Live graph fluctuating. Sleek, modern UI.

screenshots.headline: Conversion Insights
screenshots.subline: Understand why visitors buy (or don't).
screenshots.layoutIdea: Funnel visualization screen.
screenshots.visualStyle: Clean data viz, color-coded funnel stages.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a conversion funnel chart. 'Visitor' -> 'Cart' -> 'Checkout' -> 'Sale'. Percentages shown at each drop-off point.

screenshots.headline: Marketing Automation
screenshots.subline: Trigger campaigns based on user behavior.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Flowchart builder interface.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing an automation flow. 'Abandoned Cart' node connected to 'Send Email' node. Visual programming style.

screenshots.headline: Multi-Channel
screenshots.subline: All your stores in one place.
screenshots.layoutIdea: List of connected platforms (Shopify, Amazon, etc.).
screenshots.visualStyle: Grid of logos, unified status indicators.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing 'Connected Stores'. Icons for Shopify, Amazon, Bol.com. Green status lights next to each.

screenshots.headline: Smart Alerts
screenshots.subline: Get notified of spikes and drops instantly.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Notification center or lock screen view.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing push notifications. 'Sales Spike! +200% vs avg'. 'Inventory Low: SKU-123'. Highlighting real-time awareness.

icon.prompt: 1024x1024, ultra-sharp, app icon, no words, no border. A cute 3D rendered paper airplane flying through a fluffy white cloud loop. Sky blue background, vibrant colors, toy-like texture.
icon.exportNotes: Render as 1024x1024 PNG with transparent background safe zone.

screenshots.headline: Take Flight
screenshots.subline: Explore a portfolio like never before.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Cockpit view or plane flying over a landscape.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a 3D plane flying over a digital landscape labeled 'Projects'. HUD overlay with 'Altitude: High'.

screenshots.headline: Interactive World
screenshots.subline: Fly to different destinations to see skills.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Map view with flight paths.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a world map. Flight paths connecting 'Design City', 'Code Island', 'Marketing Mountain'.

screenshots.headline: Collect Passports
screenshots.subline: Earn stamps for every project you visit.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Passport book UI.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing an open digital passport. Stamps for 'React', 'Three.js', 'UI/UX'. Gamification element.

screenshots.headline: First Class
screenshots.subline: Experience premium web design.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Ticket or boarding pass UI.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a detailed digital boarding pass. 'Passenger: You', 'Destination: Excellence'. QR code for contact.

screenshots.headline: Pilot Mode
screenshots.subline: Take control of the experience.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Settings or controls screen.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing control panel. 'Speed: Mach 2', 'Graphics: Ultra'. Fun configuration options.

icon.prompt: 1024x1024, ultra-sharp, app icon, no words, no border. Minimalist outline of a canal house roof (trapgevel) in white on a vibrant Dutch orange gradient background. Clean lines, modern flat design with subtle depth.
icon.exportNotes: Render as 1024x1024 PNG with transparent background safe zone.

screenshots.headline: Find Your Roof
screenshots.subline: The smartest way to find a home in NL.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Map view with house pins.
screenshots.visualStyle: Clean map interface, orange accent pins.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a map of Amsterdam. Pins popping up. Search bar at top 'Where do you want to live?'.

screenshots.headline: Instant Alerts
screenshots.subline: Be the first to know about new listings.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Notification list or alert setup.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a push notification 'New Match! 2 Bedroom in Pijp'. User tapping it.

screenshots.headline: Price Psychology
screenshots.subline: AI analyzes if the price is fair.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Listing detail with AI analysis card.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a house listing. AI card overlay: 'Fair Price: High confidence'. 'Undervalued by 5%'.

screenshots.headline: Smart Filters
screenshots.subline: Filter by what really matters to you.
screenshots.layoutIdea: Filter modal with chips.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing filter options. 'Balcony', 'Energy Label A', 'Near Station'. Selected filters highlighted in orange.

screenshots.headline: Application Help
screenshots.subline: Generate the perfect viewing request.
screenshots.layoutIdea: AI writing assistant screen.
screenshots.visualStyle: Text editor with magic wand icon.
screenshots.prompt: iPhone 15 Pro mockup showing a message draft to a landlord. AI button 'Make it professional'. Text transforming.
